nodes.label: Welcome to EVerest Node-RED
nodes.format:
ðŸš€ EVerest Node-RED UI

Welcome to the EVerest development environment!

ðŸ“‹ Getting Started:

  1. Build the project:
    ./setup prompt
    cmake -B build -S . && ninja -C build
  2. Select a flow:
    ./setup nodered-flow <config>
  3. Start SIL simulation manually

ðŸ”§ Available Commands:

  • ./setup nodered-flows - List available flows
  • ./setup nodered-flow dc - Switch to DC simulation flow
  • ./setup nodered-status - Show current flow status

Flows will be available after building the project with cmake and ninja.
